tokens.resolved_gloss: a people (as a congregated unit); specifically, a tribe (as those of Israel); hence (collectively) troops or attendants; figuratively, a flock
tokens.translation: a people (as a congregated unit); specifically, a tribe (as those of Israel); hence (collectively) troops or attendants; figuratively, a flock

tokens.resolved_gloss: to mould into a form; especially as a potter; figuratively, to determine (i.e. form a resolution)
tokens.translation: to mould into a form; especially as a potter; figuratively, to determine (i.e. form a resolution)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to score with a mark as a tally or record, i.e. (by implication) to inscribe, and also to enumerate; intensively, to recount, i.e. celebrate
tokens.translation: properly, to score with a mark as a tally or record, i.e. (by implication) to inscribe, and also to enumerate; intensively, to recount, i.e. celebrate
